Title: Relates to exempting real property purchased by first-time homebuyers from real property taxation
Summary: Permits localities to grant a real property tax exemption for first-time homebuyers; provides declining exemption from 40% to 10% decreased over five years for first-time buyers of property within certain purchase price limits set by SONYMA.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to exempting real property purchased by first-time homebuyers from real property taxation
